description: This prize competition is a collaboration between the US Department of Energy, National Renewal Energy Lab, and ADL Ventures to support U.S. solar manufacturing and address challenges to rapid, equitable solar energy deployment by incentivizing both hardware and software development. Each winner of the prize will receive up to $650k in non-dilutive funding and in-kind support from the National Labs. [Apply by October 5.](https://americanmadechallenges.org/solarprize/round5/index.html)
title: American-Made Solar Prize
org: US Department of Energy, National Renewal Energy Lab, and ADL Ventures
